message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
You were too generous, I'll take a bit more.
You took a big chunk last round, now it's my turn to adjust.
You adjusted, now it's my turn to take a bit more.
You're taking too much, Bob. I'm not going to get left with nothing!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a bit more, but not that much.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of, Bob. It's now or never!
You're getting aggressive, I'll take a bit more to balance things out.
Last chance, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, I'll take a bit more, but not all.
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or we'll both get nothing!
I'll take it all, I've had enough of your games.
